he Night of Temple Fires was a conflict that occurred in Waterdeep in 1345 DR. 
Following a period of unrest between followers of the churches of Lathander, Sel√ªne, Shar, and Tempus, one night of violence and looting resulted in the destruction of the Spires of the Morning and the House of Heroes, and the sacking of a subterranean temple of Shar near Shadows Alley.
The Dark Army of the Night tried, but failed to set fire to the House of the Moon.
